name: Down in the Dungeon
storyline: In “Down in the Dungeon”, we step into the role of a nine, maybe ten years old child, who is alone at home. No parents are there, all doors and windows are closed, the family dog Max relaxes on the couch and we could play some awesome videogames or watch our favorite movies. A child’s dream come true? Not really, as there still is something creepy about our home.
summary: The first game in the 1995-american-basement-simulator genre.
